body: Nice work, looks good! I tested locally with the following mock server testcase: ```python class FilterUserId(TestCase): """ Matches if the user's unique ID is "testvalue". The unique ID is stored in the extensions.shield-recipe-client.user_id preference. """ def load_data(self): console_log( 'FilterUserId executed', filter_expression='normandy.userId=="testvalue"' ) ``` And it worked fine. Leaving that here for future use when I get the mock-server stuff sorted (it also depends on #437 so it's not really useful to include in this PR yet).

body_html:
Nice work, looks good! I tested locally with the following mock server testcase:

class FilterUserId(TestCase):
    """
    Matches if the user's unique ID is "testvalue". The unique ID is
    stored in the <code>extensions.shield-recipe-client.user_id</code>
    preference.
    """
    def load_data(self):
        console_log(
            'FilterUserId executed',
            filter_expression='normandy.userId=="testvalue"'
        )

And it worked fine. Leaving that here for future use when I get the mock-server stuff sorted (it also depends on #437 so it's not really useful to include in this PR yet).
